verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H376>them,<s%> 'When a man <S%H6381>makes<s%> a <S%H5088>vow,<s%> the <S%H5315>persons<s%> shall be for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> by your <S%H6187>valuation.<s%>

Your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> shall be of a <S%H2145>male<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> even to <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> even your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> shall be <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>
If it is a <S%H5347>female,<s%> then your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> shall be <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels.<s%>

If the person is from <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> even to <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> then your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> shall be for a <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> and for a <S%H5347>female<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8255>shekels.<s%>

If the person is from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> even to <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> then your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> shall be for a <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and for a <S%H5347>female<s%> your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> shall be <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

If the person is from <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward;<s%> if it is a <S%H2145>male,<s%> then your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> shall be <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> and for a <S%H5347>female<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8255>shekels.<s%>

But if he is <S%H4134>poorer<s%> than your <S%H6187>valuation,<s%> then he shall be <S%H5975>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6186>value<s%> <S%H6310>him;<s%> according to the <S%H3027>ability<s%> of him who <S%H5087>vowed<s%> shall the <S%H3548>priest<s%> value <S%H6186>him.<s%>

<S%H929><s%>"'If it is an animal, of which men <S%H7126>offer<s%> an <S%H7133>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> all that any man <S%H5414>gives<s%> of such to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> becomes <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

He shall not <S%H2498>alter<s%> <S%H4171>it,<s%> nor change <S%H2896>it,<s%> a good for a <S%H7451>bad,<s%> or a <S%H7451>bad<s%> for a <S%H2896>good:<s%> and if he shall at <S%H4171>all<s%> <S%H4171>change<s%> <S%H929>animal<s%> for <S%H929>animal,<s%> then both it and that for which it is <S%H8545>changed<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

If it is any <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>animal,<s%> of which they do not <S%H7126>offer<s%> as an <S%H7133>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> then he shall <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H929>animal<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priest;<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6186>value<s%> <S%H996>it,<s%> whether it is <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H996>or<s%> <S%H7451>bad.<s%> As you the <S%H3548>priest<s%> values <S%H6187>it,<s%> so shall it be.
But if he will <S%H1350>indeed<s%> <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H3254>it,<s%> then he shall add the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part of it to its <S%H6187>valuation.<s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'When a man <S%H6942>dedicates<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> to be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6186>evaluate<s%> <S%H2896>it,<s%> whether it is good or <S%H7451>bad:<s%> as the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6186>evaluate<s%> <S%H6965>it,<s%> so shall it stand.

If he who <S%H6942>dedicates<s%> it will <S%H1350>redeem<s%> his <S%H1004>house,<s%> then he shall <S%H3254>add<s%> the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part of the <S%H3701>money<s%> of your valuation to <S%H6187>it,<s%> and it shall be his.

<S%H376><s%>"'If a man <S%H6942>dedicates<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> part of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of his <S%H272>possession,<s%> then your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> shall be <S%H6310>according<s%> to the <S%H2233>seed<s%> for <S%H2233>it:<s%> the sowing of a <S%H2563>homer<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> shall be valued at <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>
If he <S%H6942>dedicates<s%> his <S%H7704>field<s%> from the <S%H8141>Year<s%> of <S%H3104>Jubilee,<s%> according to your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> it shall <S%H6965>stand.<s%>

But if he <S%H6942>dedicates<s%> his <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3104>Jubilee,<s%> then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2803>reckon<s%> to him the <S%H3701>money<s%> according <S%H6310>to<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> that <S%H3498>remain<s%> to the <S%H8141>Year<s%> of <S%H3104>Jubilee;<s%> and an <S%H1639>abatement<s%> shall be made from your <S%H6187>valuation.<s%>

If he who <S%H6942>dedicated<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> will <S%H1350>indeed<s%> <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H3254>it,<s%> then he shall add the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part of the <S%H3701>money<s%> of your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> to <S%H6965>it,<s%> and it shall remain his.

If he will not <S%H1350>redeem<s%> the <S%H7704>field,<s%> or if he has <S%H4376>sold<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> it shall not be redeemed any <S%H1350>more;<s%>

but the <S%H7704>field,<s%> when it goes <S%H3318>out<s%> in the <S%H3104>Jubilee,<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> as a <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H2764>devoted;<s%> it shall be <S%H272>owned<s%> by the <S%H3548>priests.<s%>
<S%H6942><s%>"'If he dedicates to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> a <S%H7704>field<s%> which he has <S%H4736>bought,<s%> which is not of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of his <S%H272>possession,<s%>

then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2803>reckon<s%> to him the <S%H4373>worth<s%> of your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> up to the <S%H8141>Year<s%> of <S%H3104>Jubilee;<s%> and he shall <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H6187>valuation<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> as a holy <S%H6944>thing<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

In the <S%H8141>Year<s%> of <S%H3104>Jubilee<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to him from whom it was <S%H7069>bought,<s%> even to him to whom the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the land <S%H776>belongs.<s%>
All your <S%H6187>valuations<s%> shall be according to the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary:<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs<s%> to the <S%H8255>shekel.<s%>

<S%H1060><s%>"'Only the firstborn among <S%H929>animals,<s%> which is made a <S%H1069>firstborn<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> no <S%H376>man<s%> may <S%H6942>dedicate<s%> <S%H7794>it;<s%> whether an ox or <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> it is <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s.

If it is an <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H929>animal,<s%> then he shall <S%H6299>buy<s%> it back according to your <S%H6187>valuation,<s%> and shall <S%H3254>add<s%> to it the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part of <S%H1350>it:<s%> or if it isn't redeemed, then it shall be <S%H4376>sold<s%> according to your <S%H6187>valuation.<s%>

<S%H2764><s%>"'Notwithstanding, no devoted thing, that a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H2763>devote<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of all that he <S%H120>has,<s%> whether of man or <S%H929>animal,<s%> or of the <S%H7704>field<s%> of his <S%H272>possession,<s%> shall be <S%H4376>sold<s%> or <S%H1350>redeemed:<s%> every devoted <S%H2764>thing<s%> is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H2764><s%>"'No one devoted, who shall <S%H3808>be<s%> <S%H2764>devoted<s%> from among <S%H120>men,<s%> shall be <S%H6299>ransomed;<s%> he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

<S%H4643><s%>"'All the tithe of the <S%H776>land,<s%> whether of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> or of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6086>trees,<s%> is <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s. It is <S%H6944>holy<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1350>redeems<s%> <S%H1350>anything<s%> of his <S%H4643>tithe,<s%> he shall <S%H3254>add<s%> a fifth part to <S%H2549>it.<s%>

All the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of the <S%H1241>herds<s%> or the <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> whatever <S%H5674>passes<s%> under the <S%H7626>rod,<s%> the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

He shall not <S%H1239>search<s%> whether it is <S%H2896>good<s%> or <S%H7451>bad,<s%> neither shall he <S%H4171>change<s%> <S%H4171>it:<s%> and if he changes it at <S%H4171>all,<s%> then both it and that for which it is <S%H8545>changed<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holy.<s%> It shall not be <S%H1350>redeemed.<s%>'"

These are the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>
